price: Badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu? Je! Wanakusaidieni, au wanajisaidia wenyewe?
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلۡ يَنصُرُونَكُمۡ أَوۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ
footnotes: Badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu, na mnadai kuwa ati ndio itakuombeeni hii leo? Je! Inakufaeni kitu kwa kukunusuruni, au hata inajifaa wenyewe kujisaidia? Hapana lolote. Kwani wao na miungu yao ni kuni za Moto.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi hal yanṣurūnakum aw yantaṣirūna
